knimeNode.name: Combine
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node return an aggregated geometry from a collection of geometries.

fullDescription.intro: This node returns a GEOMETRYCOLLECTION or a MULTI object from a set of geometries.
fullDescription.option: Select the column name to combine geometry based on same value for given column

ports.inPort: Table containing a single geometry list in GeoJSON format with non-spatial attributes. The geometry column name should be prefixed with name the_geom.
ports.outPort: Table containing list of geometries after combining them. Other non-spatial attributes are combined as comma separated list.

views.view: No view is available for this node
